description: Corrected the guitar part in bars 6 and 50-87 (wow there was a lot wrong/missing). Went through the whole song at 1/4 speed and cross-referenced it with videos of him playing - I think this is as accurate as I can make it.
title: Curse Of Castle Dragon

description: Corrected the solo in bars 44-49. Yikes that's fast.
title: Curse Of Castle Dragon

description: Corrected notes and palm muting in bars 29-43.
title: Curse Of Castle Dragon

description: Corrected and cleaned up a couple parts, corrected some fingering for the pentatonic riff and the descending scale run.
title: Curse Of Castle Dragon

description: Corrected a few more parts - bends, positioning, vibrato, slides. I think I still left out a slide somewhere, I'll have to find and add it later.
title: Curse Of Castle Dragon

description: Corrected some parts based on transcribing by ear from the record and watching him play it live.
title: Curse Of Castle Dragon
